Posts.Title: A Positive Research on Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: good that you are consulting doctor. It may be fatty tissue but then it may not be.Let the doctors decide.Cancer in its initial stage is curable & easy to handle.But later stage,the medications are very heavy.So better earlier than later.
Posts.Title: Lump Below Collar bone, above breast - need advice

Posts.Content: Has anybody complimentary therapy apart from regular cancer drugs like Graviola leaves,Apricot Kernel,Aloevera, green tea,Budwig protocol. If so, was it of any help?
Posts.Title: complimentary therapy

Posts.Content: Mamography is a very easy& cheap test.Go for it without wasting time.It may be nothing but let the doctor decide that it is nothing.
Posts.Title: A lot of pain...help, please
